title: permanents in hextech?
body: I just opened a hextech chest for getting an S- on Kled, and I opened it and got GGMF permanent. I haven't been on for a while, but that shouldn't be able to happen, right?

replies.body:
That can happen. Hextech Crafting received some changes a while back so that Ultimate and Legendary skins (GGMF being Ultimate) would automatically unlock as a permanent (unless already owned, in which case you would be able to disenchant for Orange essence).

You can learn more about the Hextech Crafting system on the [Hextech Crafting Guide Support Page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233).
My main has got 2 GGMF skins in the past month. Also I'm pretty sure you can get permanents except for if you don't own the champion.
